useSystemProxy.title: Use system proxy
useSystemProxy.description: Use the system proxy configured by your administrator.

branchOrTag.title: Ref
branchOrTag.description: Branch name, tag or sha1 (e.g. master). If empty, we use the default branch.

filepath.title: Filepath
filepath.description: The path to the file to fetch (e.g. /docs/main/README.md)

username.title: Username
username.description: Username used to authenticate the request

personalAccessToken.title: Personal Access Token
personalAccessToken.description: Create your personal access token here: https://github.com/settings/tokens
